channel.title: Project Board on Spike
channel.description: Recent content in Project Board on Spike

item.title: Project Board
item.description: We use a Kanban-style project board to keep organized with feature and bug requests, as well as outstanding pull requests for code changes. As you follow your issue (you did file an issue for a bug report or feature request, right?) or PR, you’ll notice it head through several columns in the board. Here’s what they mean. Collaborators: Note that Issues are not automatically progressed through the board. You’ll have to do that manually.
